Supplementary Material
Simultaneous determination of steroid hormones and pharmaceuticals in killer whale
(Orcinus orca) fecal samples by liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry
Andrew R.S. Ross*, Xiangjun Liao and Tanya M. Brown
Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Sidney, BC, V8L 4B2, Canada *Corresponding author: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Sidney, BC, V8L 4B2, Canada. Tel: 1 (250) 363- 6800. Email: Andrew.ross@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

sections.heading: Chemicals and Reagents
sections.text:
Methanol and methyl tertiary-butyl ether (MTBE) were liquid chromatographic grade and were purchased from VWR Canada (Mississauga, ON, Canada). Reagent alcohol and formic acid were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Canada (Oakville, ON, Canada). Double-deionized water for extraction and isolation was prepared using a Super-Q TM water purification system (Millipore SAS, France). SPE cartridges Oasis HLB (60 mg, 3 mL) were purchased from Waters Limited (Mississauga, ON, Canada).
Native standard compounds 11-deoxycorticosterone, 11-ketotestosterone, 17β-estradiol (7β-E2), 17α, 20β-dihydroxy-4-pregnen-3-one, androstenedione, androsterone, aldosterone, cortisol (hydrocortisone), corticosterone, dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA), dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate (sodium salt) (DHEAs), estriol and progesterone were purchased from Cayman Chemical Company (Ann Arbor, MI, USA) while cortisone, 11-deoxycortisol and 17α-hydroxyprogesterone (17-OHP) were obtained from Toronto Research Chemicals, Inc. (Toronto, ON, Canada). Native standard solutions of testosterone (100 µg/mL) in dioxane, estrone (100 µg/mL) in acetonitrile, fluoxetine:HCl (1.0 mg/mL free base) in methanol, sertraline (1 mg/mL) in methanol, and triclosan (100 µg/mL) in MTBE were supplied by ACP Chemical Inc. (Montreal, QC, Canada).
Labeled internal standards 11-deoxycorticosterone-d7, 11-deoxycortisol-d7, cortisone-d8 and progesterone-d9 were acquired from Toronto Research Chemicals, Inc. while 11-ketotestosteron-d3 was from Cayman Chemical Company. Other deuterated internal standards including (±)-fluoxetine-d5 HCl (phenyl-d5), 17β-estradiol-2,4,16,16-d4, 4-pregnen-17α-ol-3,20-dione-2,2,4,6,6,21,21,21-d8, cortisol-1,2d2, 16α-hydroxy-17β-estradiol-2,4-d2, and 4-pregnen-11β,21-diol-3,20-dione-2,2,4,6,6,17α,21,21-d8 were purchased from C/D/N Isotopes Inc. (Pointe-Claire, QC, Canada). Labeled internal standard solutions (100 µg/mL) including testosterone (16,16,17-d3, 98%), androsterone (5α-androstan-3α-ol-17-one) (2,2,4,4-d4, 98%), 4-androstene-3-17-dione (2,3,4-13C3, 98%), dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA) (2,2,3,4,4,6-d6, 97%), estrone (2,3,4-13C3,99%), sertraline:HCl, (d3, 98% as free base) and triclosan (13C12,
D ow nloaded from https://academ ic.oup.com /conphys/article/11/1/coad081/7410311 by Indian Institute of Technology Patna user on 11 January 2024
99%) were purchased from ACP Chemical Inc. Each was prepared in methanol except triclosan (13C12, 99%) which was prepared in MTBE.
D ow nloaded from https://academ ic.oup.com /conphys/article/11/1/coad081/7410311 by Indian Institute of Technology Patna user on 11 January 2024

title: Simultaneous determination of steroid hormones and pharmaceuticals in killer whale (Orcinus orca) fecal samples by liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry
